# flags

CREATE: create a whiteout. LOOKUP: check whether a directory supports whiteouts, DELETE: remove a whiteout.

## Fields

- **dvp**: Directory in which to create.
- **cnp**: Name information for whiteout.
- **ctx**: Context against which to authenticate whiteout creation.

items.description: Context against which to authenticate whiteout creation.
items.name: ctx
